SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.bamja.core.annotations
Annotation Type RequiredService

@Target(value=TYPE)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface RequiredService

A required service of a component.

Since:
Version: 0.1.0 (16.02.2006)
Author:
Jens Kutzsche

Required Element Summary
 java.lang.String bindMethod
           
 java.lang.Class service
           
 java.lang.String unbindMethod
           
 
Optional Element Summary
 java.lang.String filter
           
 boolean multiple
           
 boolean needFactory
           
 boolean optional
           
 RequiredService.Policy policy
           
 boolean requiredFromUser
          For deliver a services, the component required this service from the using component.
 

Element Detail

service

public abstract java.lang.Class service
Returns:
The Class of a required service (of an interface).

bindMethod

public abstract java.lang.String bindMethod
Returns:
The name of the methode in the component, which should be invoked for bind the required service.

unbindMethod

public abstract java.lang.String unbindMethod
Returns:
The name of the methode in the component, which should be invoked for unbind the required service.

filter

public abstract java.lang.String filter
Returns:
A filter in LDAP syntax to narrow the search.
Default:
""

optional

public abstract boolean optional
Returns:
true if this required service is optional and false he is obligatory.
Default:
false

multiple

public abstract boolean multiple
Returns:
true if this required service can be multiple and false he isn't it.
Default:
false

policy

public abstract RequiredService.Policy policy
Returns:
The policy for requirement handling.
Default:
STATIC

needFactory

public abstract boolean needFactory
Returns:
true if this required service should be deliver as a factory and false when should deliver as an instance.
Default:
true

requiredFromUser

public abstract boolean requiredFromUser
For deliver a services, the component required this service from the using component.

Returns:
true if the service required from the using component and false if it required from someone component.
Default:
false
